question: The address generated by the CPU is referred to as ____________
options: ['a) Physical address', 'b) Logical address', 'c) Neither physical nor logical', 'd) None of the mentioned']

question: The address loaded into the memory address register of the memory is referred to as ____________
options: ['a) Physical address', 'b) Logical address', 'c) Neither physical nor logical', 'd) None of the mentioned']

question: The run time mapping from virtual to physical addresses is done by a hardware device called the ____________
options: ['a) Virtual to physical mapper', 'b) Memory management unit', 'c) Memory mapping unit', 'd) None of the mentioned']

question: The base register is also known as the ____________
options: ['a) basic register', 'b) regular register', 'c) relocation register', 'd) delocation register']

question: The size of a process is limited to the size of ____________
options: ['a) physical memory', 'b) external storage', 'c) secondary storage', 'd) none of the mentioned']

question: If execution time binding is being used, then a process ______ be swapped to a different memory space
options: ['a) has to be', 'b) can never', 'c) must', 'd) may']

question: The backing store is generally a ____________
options: ['a) fast disk', 'b) disk large enough to accommodate copies of all memory images for all users', 'c) disk to provide direct access to the memory images', 'd) all of the mentioned']
option2: b) disk large enough to accommodate copies of all memory images for all users
option3: c) disk to provide direct access to the memory images

question: The ________ consists of all processes whose memory images are in the backing store or in memory and are ready to run
options: ['a) wait queue', 'b) ready queue', 'c) cpu', 'd) secondary storage']

question: The _________ time in a swap out of a running process and swap in of a new process into the memory is very high
options: ['a) context – switch', 'b) waiting', 'c) execution', 'd) all of the mentioned']

question: The major part of swap time is _______ time
options: ['a) waiting', 'b) transfer', 'c) execution', 'd) none of the mentioned']

question: Swapping _______ be done when a process has pending I/O, or has to execute I/O operations only into operating system buffers
Swap space is allocated ____________
options: ['a) as a chunk of disk', 'b) separate from a file system', 'c) into a file system', 'd) all of the mentioned']
option1: a) as a chunk of disk
option2: b) separate from a file system
